notes: Global leader in collagen peptide production. Peptan® brand is internationally recognized for nutricosmetics and beauty applications. Extensive R&D and clinical studies support efficacy claims. Benefits include skin hydration improvement, skin elasticity enhancement, and hair health support. Applications include nutricosmetics (beauty from within), topical cosmetics, functional foods and beverages, and dietary supplements. Global leader with premium quality positioning and worldwide production capabilities. Part of Darling Ingredients with robust quality systems.
